subtask1.ensemble: Yes, multiple model outputs were combined for the turn detection
subtask1.pretrained: PLATO-2, DeBERTa Large, DeBERTa XLarge, ALBERT XXLarge, BERT Large

subtask2.ensemble: Yes, multiple model outputs were combined for the knowledge selection
